advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: hjy79425575 working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Parsing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to disclosure of user information
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A validation issue existed in the handling of symlinks. This issue was addressed with improved validation of symlinks.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may disclose restricted memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation
advisories.description: Processing a maliciously crafted font may result in the disclosure of process memory.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin (@patch1t) of Trend Micro, CFF of Topsec Alpha Team

advisories.impact: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation
advisories.description: Processing a maliciously crafted font may result in the disclosure of process memory.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.impact: A local user may be able to leak sensitive user information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may cause a denial of service or potentially disclose memory contents
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to disclosure of user information

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to disclosure of user information

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Mickey Jin (@patch1t) of Trend Micro and Ye Zhang of Baidu Security

advisories.description: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to disclosure of user information.

cves.credit: Anonymous working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative, Jzhu working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted message may lead to a denial of service
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: The UK's National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC)

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved size validation.

cves.credit: Ian Beer of Google Project Zero

advisories.impact: A double free issue was addressed with improved memory management
advisories.description: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to break out of its sandbox
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved environment sanitization.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted certificate may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue in the ASN.1 decoder was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universal cross site scripting
advisories.description: A cross-origin issue with iframe elements was addressed with improved tracking of security origins.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to leak sensitive user information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universal cross site scripting
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memory handling.
